TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontStretch extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 描述与某个字体与该字体的正常纵横比相比的拉伸程度。

span.span: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体拉伸描述了字体格式从其正常纵横比延伸到的程度，这是字体中标志符号的原始宽度与高度的比值。A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font. 值对应于 `usWidthClass` 规范中的定义 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] 。The values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. `usWidthClass`表示介于1到9之间的整数值指示较宽的宽度; 值越高表示宽度更宽。The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9 - lower values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths. |字体拉伸Font stretch|usWidthClassusWidthClass|正常百分比% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||11|50.0%50.0%| ||22|62.5%62.5%| ||33|75.0%75.0%| ||44|87.5%87.5%| ||55|100.0%100.0%| ||66|112.5%112.5%| ||77|125.0%125.0%| ||88|150.0%150.0%| ||99|200.0%200.0%| 有关 OpenType 值的详细信息 `usWidthClass` ，请参阅 opentype 规范的 [usWidthClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/typography/opentype/spec/os2#uswidthclass) 部分。For more information on the OpenType `usWidthClass` value, see the [usWidthClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/typography/opentype/spec/os2#uswidthclass) section of the OpenType specification. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *fontStretchesValue**fontStretchesValue* 表示为名称字符串的值，例如 "紧缩"、"Normal" 或 "加宽"。A value expressed as the name string, such as "Condensed", "Normal", or "Expanded".

span.span: An value that represents the relationship between the two instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当返回值小于零时，`left` 小于 `right`。When the return value is less than zero, `left` is less than `right`. 当此值为零时，指示两个操作数相等。When this value is zero, it indicates that both operands are equal. 当该值大于零时，指示 `left` 大于 `right`。When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that `left` is greater than `right`.
